room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We did playground and had a great time. We had ages 3 to 69, with ten of us total and we all enjoyed our experience.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: I went with a group of 8 people to the “playground” escape game. All the puzzles were really neat and not super obvious. We ended up using a lot more clues than we thought we would. All of us had a good time and I would definitely go again

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: The Escape Game (Playground Room) was so challenging and so fun! It was a blast getting to know our group better and the experience really put our minds to the test. Can’t wait til my next escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: I would definitely recommend this place for groups of ALL ages! My kids are 8 and 11 and we all loved it! Playground was by far the favorite for family! We stayed in Orlando for vacation, and completed all of the rooms here because they're so much fun! Highly suggest you try this! You will not be disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Orlando in Orlando
review: We had a group of 8 that included 2 toddlers. We did the playground and it was so much fun for everyone. I would recommend for families of all ages!
